title: Bootstrap Collapse
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Hiding and Showing Content
Collapse provides the basic mechanics for toggling visibility of content with CSS transitions.

### Usage
* Trigger: Button/Link with `data-bs-toggle="collapse"` and `data-bs-target="#id"`.
* Target: Div with class `.collapse` and matching `id`.

### Accordion
Collapse is the underlying requirement for Accordions.

examples.code: Hidden content.

real_world_use_cases.description: Show first paragraph, click 'Read More' to expand rest.

summary: Collapse is a fundamental behavior used by Navbar, Accordion, and custom toggles.
